title: Ownership Structure of Silvercorp Metals Inc

content.text:
The major shareholders of Silvercorp Metals Inc include institutional investors and insiders. As of the latest available data, the top institutional shareholders are:
1. Vanguard Group Inc.: Vanguard Group Inc. owns approximately 5.09% of the outstanding shares of Silvercorp Metals Inc.
2. Fidelity Management & Research Company LLC: Fidelity Management & Research Company LLC holds around 4.06% of the company's shares.
3. BlackRock Institutional Trust Company, N.A.: BlackRock Institutional Trust Company, N.A. has a stake of about 3.39% in Silvercorp Metals Inc.
4. Mackenzie Financial Corporation: Mackenzie Financial Corporation holds approximately 2.87% of the company's shares.
5. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP: Dimensional Fund Advisors LP owns around 2.39% of the outstanding shares of Silvercorp Metals Inc.

Insider ownership refers to the percentage of shares held by individuals associated with the company. The insider ownership in Silvercorp Metals Inc is as follows:
1. Mr. Rui Feng, the Chairman and CEO of Silvercorp Metals Inc, owns approximately 26.44% of the outstanding shares.
2. Mr. Yikang Liu, the President and Director of the company, holds around 2.73% of the company's shares.
3. Mr. Myles Gao, the Senior Vice President, has a stake of about 0.53% in Silvercorp Metals Inc.
4. Other insiders collectively own approximately 0.63% of the outstanding shares.
